page.title: 08HOUSING IN & AROUND MILLAND
page.content: the housing in this block is very scattered-there are farms and small houses all over the area.there is a concentration of houses on the southern outskirts of liphook near the station, and an estate of fairly large houses adjoining the golf course. rake village on the western boundry has a small concentration of houses with a shop, a garage and a pub. likewise redford on the eastern boundry has a number of houses, a shop and a garage. the largest concentration is in the centre of milland where there are five housing estates as well as a garage and a pub. over the area there are several large houses with their own estates-there is foley manor,hooklands hollycombe, forest mere which is a health farm,langley court is converted into maisonettes, and milland place which is a hotel.
